text.0: with offering for success in fight whence indra was victorious.
text.1: with this o brahmaṇaspati let us attain to royal sway.
text.2: subduing those who rival us subduing all malignities.
text.3: withstand the man who menaces withstand the man who angers us.
text.4: soma and savitar the god have made thee a victorious king.
text.5: all elements have aided thee to make thee general conqueror.
text.6: oblation that which indra gave and thus grew glorious and most high.
text.7: this have i offered gods and hence now verily am rivalless.
text.8: slayer of rivals rivalless victorious with royal sway.
text.9: over these beings may i rule may i be sovran of the folk.
